title: 港共已經全面鎮壓 《告國際港人書》

replies.msg:
近呢兩晚嘅黑警鎮壓，都已經正式宣告不對等內戰嘅開始， 特別係而家仍然進行緊嘅暴大戰役， 都顯示林鄭月娥為首嘅赤納粹傀儡政府，以及佢哋嘅背後走狗同支持者，都唔再視香港嘅年輕人為人類看待， 並用盡佢哋所能去消滅過下代人，從而延續赤納粹嘅政治生命。

故此，我喺呢度有幾句說話，想同喺海外進行文宣嘅手足，同身在海外嘅香港人講， 因為以下建議，可能會係你哋文宣轉風向嘅參考:

首先，除咗要落力爭取西方政商界嘅支持之外， 同時亦都要全面令海外普羅大眾明白，一但香港嘅抗共革命失敗嘅話， 唔單止會令所有喺香港有資產利益嘅人士蒙受損失之外 ，亦都會使各國將會面對中共赤納粹所操控嘅動員勢力，破壞貴國自身社會秩序和威脅文明世界的存亡， 當中包括宣傳戰、人口殖民、代理操控、 經濟戰 、貨幣操控、甚至代理戰爭。
呢啲事情嘅發生，都係可能會因為世界各國都對中共嘅侵略性舉動視若無睹或坐以待斃， 而可以借香港鎮壓嘅經驗照板煮碗再嚟多次。
所以必須要令海外群眾了解到中共赤納粹嘅危險性 ，並提醒香港所發生嘅事情，佢哋嘅地方亦都有可能發生！

此外， 大家都唔好忘記赤納粹亦都開始對西方世界以及社交媒體，進行類似俄羅斯操控西方政治嘅宣傳戰， 當中包括抹黑前線手足、正當化血腥手段，以及轉移視線， 佢哋呢啲內容農場式嘅謊言謬論，都好容易借西方言論自由嘅 漏洞去灌輸佢哋呢種反智嘅假訊息， 從而操控 西方民意打壓抗爭手足。
所以喺做文宣爭取海外政商界和民眾支持嘅同時，亦都要旗幟鮮明逐點反駁佢哋嘅荒謬言論， 因為當權者長時間講咁多大話， 會令群眾都相信嗰個大話係真嘅， 簡單啲就係戈培爾效應

另外，我喺呢度要特別同美國人講， 現時港共政府嘅血腥鎮壓已經可以符合到特朗普全面取消中美trade deal嘅理由， 就係佢講句香港嘅抗爭運動走向六四式血腥鎮壓嘅話，就直接停止談判同達成協議。 故此就算大多數政商界，未必會喺輿論上企喺香港抗爭者嗰一面嘅話， 亦都唔好擔心， 因為你哋係有權用佢哋嘅選票同經濟能力去制裁嗰啲違背文明價值觀嘅政商大佬。
所以必須要明白解救香港人於水深火熱之中嘅必要性 ， 從而可以令我哋嘅前線手足有一個堅強嘅後盾支持。

最後，我喺呢度同所有有睇呢篇文嘅大家講 ( 包括長時間監察連登著嘅黑警走狗同土共 ) ， 港共同赤納粹嘅所作所為已經好一清二楚， 因為佢哋嘅一舉已經係干犯咗反人類嘅罪行， 為咗自己嘅政治目的以及政治存亡，就不惜以攬炒嘅心態，去犧牲香港平民百姓嘅生命財產安全，以及公然褫奪佢哋嘅基本公民權利， 甚至當然喺大眾眼前 向手無寸鐵嘅平民致命武力， 從而將恐懼植入喺社會當中。
所以呢個時候仲唔以你所能去反抗嘅話， 喺嗰個政權機器眼中你只不過係一個可以宰殺嘅行屍走肉， 就算你點維護呢個政權，你都要好似性玩具咁樣被用完即棄， 更加唔洗講你以後將會被貼上遺臭萬年嘅罪名。

「光復香港時代革命」並唔係一個恐怖主義式嘅意識形態， 係象徵住一個可以喺屬於自己嘅家園安居樂業、生兒育女、一展所長嘅希望， 時代革命就係代表以社會變革嘅力量去打造光明大路， 從而可以令我哋嘅子女可以係一個冇恐懼壓迫嘅家園一入面成長。

我希望手足們可以喺呢個內戰當中，留住自己唯一嘅生命去奮鬥落去， 直至到我哋呢個家園重獲自由， 或與敵同歸於盡。

我們永不忘記 我們永不原諒
我們必定反抗 我們必定報仇

光復香港時代革命
驅逐共黨解放香港
肅清警隊刻不容緩

皇天
可唔可以幫幫手翻譯做英文

replies.msg:
可唔可以發起一人一信要求停課
https://lih.kg/1712125
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

In these nights, the suppression from the Hong Kong Police shows the beginning of an unfair battle, especially in the battle of the Chinese University of Hong Kong right now. It is obvious that Carrie Lam, the head of Chinazi puppet government, and the supporters behind her, do not perceive Hong Kong teenagers as human. They attempt to eliminate the next generation as much as possible, to extend the Chinazi government.

Therefore, I want to say something to the foreign brothers that are spreading propaganda, and also to the Hongkongers living overseas, because the following suggestions could be important for making of the propagandas:

First, besides gaining the support from the political and business leaders, we also need to let all foreigners know, if the anti-Communism revolution fails, not only will all assets owners in Hong Kong suffer losses, but it will also lead to the manipulation of all countries by the Chinazi power, destroying the regulations of countries and threatening the civilized world. This includes the propaganda war, colonization, manipulation, economic war, currency manipulation and even real war. These will happen probably because of the ignorance of the invasive actions from the Chinazi government in all countries, and the government can even reference the suppression of Hong Kong, and do the same for other countries. Therefore, we need to let all foreigners know about the dangers of Chinazi, and remember what happened in Hong Kong, as it might also happen in other places!

Besides, we should not forget that Chinazi is manipulating the West and its social media, just like the propaganda war of the USSR, including the accusation of the protesters, normalizing violent means, and shifting its focus. These lies are similar to content farms, utilizing the freedom of speech in the West to instill these fake messsages in order to control the public opinion to suppress the protesters. Therefore, while spreading propagandas to gain support from the foreign public, we should clearly refute their absurd lies, because when the power holder tells lies for a long time, the public would believe in those lies, just like the Goebbels effect.

Moreoever, I want to tell the US people that the violent suppression by the Hong Kong government matches the reason that Trump would fully cancel the US-China trade deal, as he says that if the Hong Kong social movements becomes the violent suppression in Tiananmen Square, they would halt the talk on trade deals and agreement. So even if many political and business leaders do not stand with Hong Kong protesters, we should not worry, as we have the rights to vote and use the economic powers to sanction leaders that go against the civilized views. Therefore, we need to know the importance of saving Hong Kong people under fire, and let the protesters know that they are strongly supported.

Finally, I want to say to all who see this message (including those police dogs and wumao monitoring the forum) that the actions of the Hong Kong government and Chinazi are very obvious that they violated the rights of human. They just want to fulfill their political goals with whatever it takes by sacrificing the lives of Hong Kong citizens and assets, taking away the civil rights from them, and even using lethal force on unarmed civilians, to implant a fearful atmosphere in the society. So if you do not fight against them with all we have, then you are just a dead man walking that can be slaughtered at any moment. No matter how you protect this regime, you will be quickly abandoned after being used, just like a condom, not to mention the crime labelled on you forever.

"Liberate Hong Kong, the revolution of our times" is not a ideological form of terrorism, but it symbolizes the hope of having a place to establish our homes, raising children, doing what we are capable of. "The revolution of our times" means that we use the power of revolution to build a path without fear for our next generations.

I hope all brothers will keep their only lives to fight in the battle, until we gain freedom in this land, or perish together with the enemy.

We will never forget
We will never forgive

We will fight back
We will take revenge

Liberate Hong Kong, the revolution of our times
Resist Beijing, liberate Hong Kong
Cleanse the Police Force, no time to lose

sor for goodest english

replies.msg:
The violent crackdowns in recent night has formally and unspokenly declared the start of an war of asymmetric warfare. This is especially true for the battle currently happening in the Chinese university of Hong Kong right at the time when this manifesto is written. All of these have shown that the Beijing-backed puppet government lead by chief executive Carrie Lam, as well as their supporters, no longer treat Hong Kong youngsters human being. They are doing everything they can to destroy and destruct our younger generation, in order to sustain the authoritarian regime.

I have a few words for all Hongkongese who’re currently abroad, as well as for everyone supported Hong Kong outside the country. These are some suggestions that might be useful for those who’re trying to help people outside of Hong Kong to understand what is currently happening and where is this leading us to.

First of all, besides fighting for the support of business and political parties in the western countries, it is also critical to remind the general public that if the anti-Beijing revolution in Hong Kong failed, not only will every single stakeholders suffer economical consequences, the most worrying factor is that the communist government backed forces (both economically and politically) will damage every single country’s law and order, as well as threaten human civilization per se. Their strategies include but are not limited to spreading propaganda, cultural colonization, proxy manipulation, trade wars, manipulating currencies, and proxy war.

All of these, could happen all over again if every other countries sit still and ignore the communist government’s invasion, with Hong Kong being a good example. It is therefore crucial for those who’re outside Hong Kong to understand the treats that the Beijing government brings. It is also our obligation to remind everyone that what’s currently happening in Hong Kong could happy to every one of us.

In addition to that, lest not forget the Chinese government has learnt to control social media and public opinions in the Europe and America, similar to what the Russia government has been doing. The strategy includes but is not limited to smearing protesters fighting for democracy, justifying your violence, and spinning. They spread fake news and lies in a content farming style, which left foreign countries vulnerable as the freedom of speech is being exploited. While they feed the general public with misleading information and fake news, they could easily manipulate public opinion and repress those who fight for their rights. Therefore, while we fight for economical and political support from foreign countries, it is critical that we refute their fallacy and quibble. We should all be vigilant of the Goebbels effect. When a dictating government tells a lie for long enough, people will start taking it as the truth.

A special word for all Americans: the bloody suppression of the Hong Kong people by the china backed government is more than enough of a reason for president Trump to call off the trade deal between the United States and china. The president has once said shall they revolution in Hong Kong progresses towards a 64-incidence (also known as Tiananmen massacre) ending, the deal and negotiation will be called off at once. In the case of where Hong Kong does not have the support of the major business and political parties, fear not. Remember all of you have the right to punish those who refuse to share the same set of civilized values with us, with your bank notes and votes. You should therefore understand the importance of saving the Hong Kong people from this living hell, and back those fighting at the frontline with your support.

Last but not least, I would like to say to all of you who’ve been reading so far, including those who are spying on us, that every single act, all your anti-human crime, of the Beijing backed government is being watched and seen. You’ve sacrificed the interests, safety, and lives of the commons in Hong Kong, as well as deprived their civil rights. You’ve exposed the public to lethal forces, seeded fear into the society. If you failed stand up and fight back at this point, you’re nothing more than a disposable condom in the eyes of the autarchic government. Regardless of how hard you tried to protect this government, you’re still going to be disposed soon enough, let alone your everlasting shame.

“Liberate Hong Kong, the revolution of our times” is not terrorism. It signifies a hope where everyone could live in a safe place, raise their children, chase their dreams and achieve goals. It represents building a new future with the power of revolution, so that our children can grow up in a place where they do not have to fear.

I urge all our brothers and sisters could fight in this civil war, while staying alive, until we liberate this country, or until we burn with our enemies.

We will never forget and we will never forgive
We will fight back and we will have our vengeance.
Liberate Hong Kong, the revolution of our times
Exile dictatorship and liberate Hong Kong.
Purge the corrupted police force at once.

#盡咗力
#英文唔好
#屌細力d

replies.msg: 就好似美國喺珍珠港事件之前袖手旁觀

咁我放埋我嘅劣作出嚟...
An unjust civil war has just been declared upon us by the brutal suppression from the Hong Kong Police Force these two nights. The ongoing battle at the Chinese University of Hong Kong has proven that the puppet government of Chinazi led by Carrie Lam with the backing by their running dogs, no longer treats Hong Kongers, especially young people, as humans. They will use every weapon in their armoury to wipe out the entire new generation in order to extend the lingering life of CCP.

Seeing that, there are several words to be said to our fellow …, and overseas Hong Kongers, the following may be a reference of how to change ways when delivering messages and news in Hong Kong.

First of all, besides the endeavour to seek support from politicians and industrialists, it is also vital to make the general public understand that in case the revolution here in Hong Kong is trampled, not only will those who invest in Hong Kong bear their loss, but the threat will also directly point at all democratic societies with the possible result of jeopardising the existence of our civilisation, in means of propaganda, diluting their population by immigrants, controlling of politics by puppets, economic wars, manipulation of currencies, and even proxy wars.

Countries tolerating or turning a blind eye towards the invasion of CCP could, and mostly will give the green light for them to do so. Suppressing the revolution in Hong Kong would be a precedent experience they can follow. That is precisely why we must convince them of the fatalness of CCP and remind them to show solicitude for things happening in Hong Kong before it is too late, before what happens in Hong Kong today happens to them tomorrow.

Also, not to forget that CCP has already initiated their propaganda in social media to defame our fellow protestors, rationalise their brutality and divert attention, like what Russia has been doing so as to take control of their politics. Those lies and fallacies generated by content farms make use of the loophole of freedom of speech to instill whatever they want and manipulate public opinion. Therefore, while keeping up the endeavour to seek support from politicians and industrialists, we must counterargue their lies and fallacies. Because ‘a lie’ is no longer ‘a lie’ when everyone is believing it, or put simply, of the Goebbels effect.

What’s more, this is especially for the Americans, the bloody suppression is a sound reason for Trump to cancel the trade deal between US and China. He has promised that if the protests in Hong Kong end up like the 1989 Tiananmen Massacre, he will draw up the negotiation and the agreement. Even if some politicians and industrialists do not stand with Hong Kong, you can still use your votes and your financial abilities to kick off those who go against the values of civilisation. Please understand the desperate of Hong Kongers facing, defend Hong Kong and the world together, and become the fortress of our brothers and sisters who fight in the frontline.

Lastly, A few words for all who are reading this (including running dogs, dirty cops and CCP who have been monitoring LIHKG). All the vicious shits Chinazi and the Hong Kong Government have done have proven by themselves that they are committing anti-humanity crimes. Sacrificing the safety and properties of people, and usurping our basic human rights to reach your political aims and linger yourselves out. Even employing fatal force towards unarmed civilians just to implant terror in society. If we still do not do whatever we can to resist, under this tyranny, we will only be lambs waiting for slaughter. However hard you are trying to defend this tyranny, you will only be disposable condoms, and bear the notorious name forever.

‘Liberate Hong Kong, the revolution of our times’ is not an ideology of terrorism, instead, it is merely a wish of being able to build a home, a family, a life in our own place. Revolution of our times represents to pave a bright avenue by the leverage of societal changes, to allow our next generation to grow up in a home free of terror.

I hope everyone can hold onto our lives to keep fighting in any means in the war until freedom shines upon us, or we will burn together with our enemies.

We’ll never forget, we’ll never forgive.
We’ll forever resist, we’ll forever avenge.

Liberate Hong Kong, the revolution of our times.
Cast out the commies, free Hong Kong.
Purge the police, now or never.

咁我放埋我嘅劣作出嚟...
An unjust civil war has just been declared upon us by the brutal suppression from the Hong Kong Police Force these two nights. The ongoing battle at the Chinese University of Hong Kong has proven that the puppet government of Chinazi led by Carrie Lam with the backing by their running dogs, no longer treats Hong Kongers, especially young people, as humans. They will use every weapon in their armoury to wipe out the entire new generation in order to extend the lingering life of CCP.

Seeing that, there are several words to be said to our fellow fighters, and overseas Hong Kongers, the following may be a reference of how to change ways when delivering messages and news in Hong Kong.

First of all, besides the endeavour to seek support from politicians and industrialists, it is also vital to make the general public understand that in case the revolution here in Hong Kong is trampled, not only will those who invest in Hong Kong bear their loss, but the threat will also directly point at all democratic societies with the possible result of jeopardising the existence of our civilisation, in means of propaganda, diluting their population by immigrants, controlling of politics by puppets, economic wars, manipulation of currencies, and even proxy wars.

Countries tolerating or turning a blind eye towards the invasion of CCP could, and mostly will give the green light for them to do so. Suppressing the revolution in Hong Kong would be a precedent experience they can follow. That is precisely why we must convince them of the fatalness of CCP and remind them to show solicitude for things happening in Hong Kong before it is too late, before what happens in Hong Kong today happens to them tomorrow.

Also, not to forget that CCP has already initiated their propaganda in social media to defame our fellow protestors, rationalise their brutality and divert attention, like what Russia has been doing so as to take control of their politics. Those lies and fallacies generated by content farms make use of the loophole of freedom of speech to instill whatever they want and manipulate public opinion. Therefore, while keeping up the endeavour to seek support from politicians and industrialists, we must counterargue their lies and fallacies. Because ‘a lie’ is no longer ‘a lie’ when everyone is believing it, or put simply, of the Goebbels effect.

What’s more, this is especially for the Americans, the bloody suppression is a sound reason for Trump to cancel the trade deal between US and China. He has promised that if the protests in Hong Kong end up like the 1989 Tiananmen Massacre, he will draw up the negotiation and the agreement. Even if some politicians and industrialists do not stand with Hong Kong, you can still use your votes and your financial abilities to kick off those who go against the values of civilisation. Please understand the desperate of Hong Kongers facing, defend Hong Kong and the world together, and become the fortress of our brothers and sisters who fight in the frontline.

Lastly, A few words for all who are reading this (including running dogs, dirty cops and CCP who have been monitoring LIHKG). All the vicious shits Chinazi and the Hong Kong Government have done have proven by themselves that they are committing anti-humanity crimes. Sacrificing the safety and properties of people, and usurping our basic human rights to reach your political aims and linger yourselves out. Even employing fatal force towards unarmed civilians just to implant terror in society. If we still do not do whatever we can to resist, under this tyranny, we will only be lambs waiting for slaughter. However hard you are trying to defend this tyranny, you will only be disposable condoms, and bear the notorious name forever.
